article.name: Scam of the Week Historical List
article.title: Scam of the Week Historical List
article.body:
The Scam of the Week email template is a great way to keep your users informed about the newest social engineering scams. Based on content from the KnowBe4 blog, the template is updated and replaced weekly. This article lists the date and title for each Scam of the Week in descending order. For more information on Scam of the Week emails, please see our How to Set Up a "Scam of the Week" Newsletter article.
